data.thought: S8|H|S5|Swarm Phenotype A4: 'Distributed MapReduce Reasoning'. Problem decomposed into N sub-problems. Each notebook = mapper (processes shard, produces partial result). Reducer notebook synthesizes. Observable topology in Observatory. Use case: large codebase analysis, multi-doc research synthesis, parallel hypothesis testing. Key innovation: reasoning parallelism, not just compute parallelism. Each mapper uses Thoughtbox independently, reducer does meta-reasoning on outputs.
